attributes.action: Mr.Christopher Alder scandal - Falklands veteran choked to death in police custody - seeking an independent review.
attributes.additional_details:
As reported in November 3rd Sunday Express by Journalist Geraint Jones - A Grace Kamara (77) was buried in ex-paratrooper grave. His body lay (disgracefully) in a mortuary 11 years before it was found in 2011.
South Yorkshire police, which said there was "no realistic prospect" of conviction for misconduct or the prevention of a lawful burial and the C.P.S. concluded there was insufficient evidence to press charges...so that's alright then.!!!!
Mr. Alder nor Grace Kamara can speak for them selves perhaps someone with a conscience, at a senior level in government can?! Their respective families are grief stricken." devastated"
Please sign this petition.

rejection.details: It is not clear whether you are seeking an independent review relating to the death of Mr Alder in custody (as implied by the title of the petition) or the prevention of lawful burial (as implied by the description).  If you reword the petition we will consider again.
